adrFormatAddress: 4159 Broadway, New York, NY 10033, USA

originalText.text: I sighed in at 8:30 first on a list for a 9:00 appt, 3 patients came abter me and finally at 9:30 Carla the receptionist arrived and Dr Yetman shortly after. I was ignored and saw each patient seen and leave and tried to tell Carla I had another engagement. About 10:15 she brought me to a room for a sonagram and by 10:50 I had seen nobody and walked out and was told They would come very shortly. By 11:15 I had no choise but to leave or miss my other appt.

originalText.text: I started seeing Dr. Yetman last October,  he took the time to explain everything and in a language that I understood. You can tell that he loves what he does, and the staffs are amazing from the front desk to  the assistant in the procedure room everyone there are amazing. I would recommend any and everyone to visit.

originalText.text:
Dont go to this clinic. They are very unprofessional. My mom went to go and check out what was wrong with her leg since she couldn't walk very well. When we arrived, I waited for her for almost 3 hours to come out. When she finally came out, she had gotten bad news and couldn't explain it well to me. I asked the doctor and he told me that "even if we explain things to your daughter, we don't need you to understand what we are doing." We were both so surprised to hear this. The nurse there tried to explain to us a little but we still came out a little puzzled
please go get a second opinion. These people are not reliable when it comes to your health.

originalText.text:
USA vein clinic is the most unprofessional medical establishment I've ever dealt with and I regret utilizing their services.  I was unable to complete my intended procedure due to insurance issues and losing my job due to Covid. There was no type of empathy from their billing department and after speaking with someone and explaining my situation to him,  USA vein clinic processed my debit card the day before Thanksgiving.
Then when I tried to contact them repeatedly no one in billing answered, I kept getting put on hold without anyone returning my call and finally I put in a complaint in which I got unexpectedly put on hold again. The staff there are rude, careless and unprofessional.  I would never give them business nor reccomend them.
I have physicians at NYU and Columbia Presbyterian and I will complain discuss my issues with anyone who will listen.  They are awful!

originalText.text: Clean office and professional staff. Dr. Hurst was amazing. He made me feel so comfortable and took his time to explain everything to me in detail. Did not feel rushed at all. I would highly recommend. Thanks!
